Nintendo - Company numbers.

V2.1 2006-03-24
   Added EP.
V2.0 2006-02-27
   Added 0Q.
V1.9 2005-10-22
   Added FR.
   Added H1.
   Fixed 7K.
V1.8 2005-09-26
   Added VN.
V1.7 2005-07-02
   Added NK.
V1.6 2005-03-19
   Added GH & TK.
V1.5 2004-10-27
   Added 7V.
V1.4 2004-10-27
   Added 7S.
V1.3 2004-07-26
   Added FL, FQ, GE & H3.
V1.2 2004-05-24
   Added FS & FT.
V1.3 2004-06-00
   Added FP & GY.


For MGB/CGB/AGB/NES/FC/SNES/SFC/DOL/NDS.
Note! number 33 is not a company but referencing a different place for the company number.
Very few NES/FC games use this at all, Nintendo, Capcom, Taito, Imagineer, Natsume, Pony Canyon & Konami found.
NES/FC number (if it exists) is at the end of the PRG rom (0x20008 or 0x40008 (including header that is)).
FamicomDiskSystem number is at 0x000F (without any header) in the disc image.
DOL (Gamecube) number is in the boot.bin file in the root of the disc, at address 0x0004 & 0x0005.
I have not found where/if there is a company number in N64 roms.


01 = Nintendo				(F-Zero,Metroid,Pokemon,Super Mario,Zelda)
02 = Rocket Games (unlicensed?)	(Karate Joe(GBC))
     Ajinomoto				(Motoko Chan no Wonder Kitchen(J)(SNES))
03 = Imagineer-Zoom			(Dolucky's... (J)(SNES))
